# canOverlapSourceViewRect

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value indicating whether the popover can overlap its view rectangle.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var canOverlapSourceViewRect: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

Setting this property to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] allows the popover to overlap the rectangle in the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPopoverPresentationController/sourceRect] property when space is constrained. The default value of this property is false, which prevents the popover from overlapping the source rectangle.

## Configuring the popover appearance

- **popoverLayoutMargins**: The margins that define the portion of the screen in which it is permissible to display the popover.
- **backgroundColor**: The color of the popover’s backdrop view.
- **passthroughViews**: An array of views that the user can interact with while the popover is visible.
- **popoverBackgroundViewClass**: The class to use for displaying the popover background content.
